title: The English language: patterns of usage
brief_description: The words a person uses, their pronunciation, the construction of phrases and sentences, dialects and speech rhythms are all aspects of usage and style. In this film we see how speech styles and acceptability vary with individuals and culture groups, and in different language situations.
